short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OFFLINE-NOTE makes it a Markdown editor instead of the default [New Tab] in Google Chrome.
short.ja: OFFLINE-NOTEはGoogle Chromeのデフォルトの「新しいタブ」の代わりにMarkdownエディタにしてくれます。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Easy
Just open a new tab and write whatever you want.
When you open a new tab next time, the contents you entered last time will remain.

- Note List
You can create multiple notes as needed.


By writing using the powerful Markdown syntax, various expressions become possible. Check out this great guide
on Markdown syntax .

- Writing offline
OFFLINE-NOTE is stored on the browser, not on the server.
You can create and edit notes even in an offline environment.
